SELECT dept_code AS deptCode, dept_name AS deptName, course_selections AS courseSelections, basic_target_courses_num AS basicTargetCoursesNum, advanced_target_courses_num AS advancedTargetCoursesNum, practical_target_courses_num AS practicalTargetCoursesNum FROM dept_course_selections

SELECT dept_code AS deptCode, dept_name AS deptName, course_selections AS courseSelections, basic_target_courses_num AS basicTargetCoursesNum, advanced_target_courses_num AS advancedTargetCoursesNum, practical_target_courses_num AS practicalTargetCoursesNum FROM dept_course_selections WHERE dept_code = #{deptCode} LIMIT 1
